alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 5:45AM PDT until April 04 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph near beaches and headlands. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible, but should remain rather isolated. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
